descriptionBox",name:"description",value:editObj.description,onChange:handleEditChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"editButtons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faCheck,className:"saveIcon",onClick:()=>saveEdit(keeper._id)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faTimes,className:"cancelIcon",onClick:cancelEdit})]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"title",children:[keeper.title,/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faEdit,className:"editIcon",onClick:()=>startEdit(keeper)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faTrash,className:"deleteIcon",onClick:()=>deleteKeeper(keeper._id)})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"descriptionBox",value:keeper.description,readOnly:true})]})},keeper._id))},index))});};export
